I was in Wisconsin today for a short period, enough to see the gloom and doom descending on the state after Brett Favre announced his retirement. Glum moods, despair, bewilderment, hopelessness. Flags were beginning to be flown at half staff. Much beer will be consumed in an effort to help ease the pain and shock all cheeseheads are feeling at this moment.
 
 Drop a line of condolence here for our poor brothers and sisters in Dairyland. They really need it.

title: 4Forums.com Political Debates and Polls -  Brett Favre
